thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Entertainment One Announces Pricing Of 70 Mln Stg Notes

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Entertainment One Announces Pricing Of 70 Mln Stg Notes
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Entertainment One Ltd:
* PRICING OF £70 MILLION SENIOR SECURED NOTES * ENTERTAINMENT ONE - ‍HAS PRICED ITS OFFERING OF £70 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT EXECUTED VIA A TAP OF ITS EXISTING £285 MILLION SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE DEC 2022​
* ‍ISSUANCE PRICE OF ADDITIONAL NOTES WAS 105.75% WITH AN IMPLIED YIELD TO WORST OF 3.9%​
* ‍NET PROCEEDS FROM ISSUANCE OF ADDITIONAL NOTES WILL BE USED TO PART FUND CASH CONSIDERATION FOR ACQUISITION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
